1.1.name: wordpress/facebook-awd-app-requests
1.1.description:
FACEBOOK AWD

This plugin will add shortcode and widget that add app requests button. If a user click on the button, Facebook will show a pop up with the choice list of friends to invite. Add your own css class on the button. Set your own message request for each button.

FACEBOOK AWD v1.4 required.
